qas.question: From when will there be new rules for unvaccinated travellers arriving in st lucia?

answers.text: From 5 March 2022 there are new rules for unvaccinated travellers arriving in St Lucia

qas.question: What will be restricted for unvaccinated travellers arriving in st lucia?
How long will restrictions for unvaccinated travellers last?

paragraphs.context: From 5 March 2022 there are new rules for unvaccinated travellers arriving in St Lucia, that may restrict accommodation and movement for the first 14 days.
